WeaponTraitDef.label: holoscope
WeaponTraitDef.description: This holographic sight projects a clear reticle into the user's field of view. It enables rapid, both-eyes-open aiming, which significantly reduces targeting time and increases precision from point-blank to medium ranges.

WeaponTraitDef.label: red dot scope
WeaponTraitDef.description: This electronic sight provides a single, illuminated red dot as the aiming point. By eliminating the need to align traditional front and rear sights, it dramatically simplifies the aiming process, improving accuracy across all effective ranges.

WeaponTraitDef.label: 2x scope
WeaponTraitDef.description: This optical scope offers 2x magnification, making the target appear larger and clearer. It provides a significant advantage for precise aiming in medium-range combat.

WeaponTraitDef.label: 4x scope
WeaponTraitDef.description: Offering 4x magnification, this optical scope is designed for effective engagement at medium to long distances. It allows the user to clearly identify and precisely aim at distant targets, slightly extending the weapon's maximum effective range.

WeaponTraitDef.label: 8x scope
WeaponTraitDef.description: A powerful 8x optical scope built for precision at long distances. Its high magnification brings distant targets into sharp focus, allowing for accurate shots at the outer limits of the weapon's effective range.
